verses.text: \w For|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* choirmaster. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w Psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. When Nathan \w the|strong="H1732"\w* prophet \w came|strong="H1732"\w* \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w him|strong="H1732"\w* after \w his|strong="H1732"\w* adultery \w with|strong="H1732"\w* Bathsheba. \w Have|strong="H1732"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H5329"\w* me, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, according \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w Your|strong="H1732"\w* loving devotion; according \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w Your|strong="H1732"\w* great compassion, blot out \w my|strong="H1732"\w* transgressions.
Wash me clean \w of|strong="H5030"\w* my iniquity \w and|strong="H5030"\w* cleanse me \w from|strong="H5030"\w* my sin.

\w For|strong="H2617"\w* \w I|strong="H6588"\w* know \w my|strong="H7230"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w*, \w and|strong="H2617"\w* \w my|strong="H7230"\w* \w sin|strong="H6588"\w* \w is|strong="H2617"\w* always before \w me|strong="H2603"\w*.

Against \w You|strong="H7235"\w*, \w You|strong="H7235"\w* \w only|strong="H7235"\w*, \w have|strong="H5771"\w* \w I|strong="H5771"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2403"\w* \w and|strong="H2403"\w* done what \w is|strong="H5771"\w* \w evil|strong="H5771"\w* \w in|strong="H7235"\w* \w Your|strong="H7235"\w* sight, \w so|strong="H7235"\w* \w that|strong="H2403"\w* \w You|strong="H7235"\w* may \w be|strong="H5771"\w* proved right \w when|strong="H7235"\w* \w You|strong="H7235"\w* speak \w and|strong="H2403"\w* blameless \w when|strong="H7235"\w* \w You|strong="H7235"\w* judge.

\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* was brought \w forth|strong="H3045"\w* \w in|strong="H3045"\w* iniquity; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* was \w sinful|strong="H2403"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* mother conceived \w me|strong="H5048"\w*.

\w Surely|strong="H6213"\w* \w You|strong="H6213"\w* desire truth \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* inmost being; \w You|strong="H6213"\w* teach \w me|strong="H6213"\w* wisdom \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* inmost place.

Purify me \w with|strong="H5771"\w* hyssop, \w and|strong="H5771"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H5771"\w* \w be|strong="H5771"\w* clean; wash me, \w and|strong="H5771"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H5771"\w* \w be|strong="H5771"\w* whiter than snow.
Let \w me|strong="H3045"\w* hear joy \w and|strong="H2451"\w* gladness; let \w the|strong="H3045"\w* bones \w You|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* crushed rejoice.
Hide \w Your|strong="H3526"\w* face \w from|strong="H2398"\w* my \w sins|strong="H2398"\w* \w and|strong="H2398"\w* blot out \w all|strong="H2398"\w* my iniquities.

Create \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* clean \w heart|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* renew \w a|strong="H3068"\w* right spirit within \w me|strong="H8085"\w*.

Cast \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w not|strong="H6440"\w* \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*; take \w not|strong="H6440"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* Holy Spirit \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Restore|strong="H2318"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w me|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* joy \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w Your|strong="H3559"\w* salvation, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w sustain|strong="H3559"\w* \w me|strong="H3559"\w* \w with|strong="H3820"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* willing \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w I|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H7307"\w* teach transgressors \w Your|strong="H3947"\w* ways, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* sinners \w will|strong="H7307"\w* return \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w You|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Deliver|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* bloodguilt, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w the|strong="H7725"\w* God \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* tongue \w will|strong="H7307"\w* sing \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w Your|strong="H7725"\w* righteousness.
\w O|strong="H3068"\w* Lord, open \w my|strong="H7725"\w* lips, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* mouth \w will|strong="H7725"\w* declare \w Your|strong="H7725"\w* praise.

\w For|strong="H7442"\w* \w You|strong="H5337"\w* do not delight \w in|strong="H8668"\w* sacrifice, \w or|strong="H1818"\w* \w I|strong="H6666"\w* would bring \w it|strong="H6666"\w*; \w You|strong="H5337"\w* \w take|strong="H5337"\w* no pleasure \w in|strong="H8668"\w* burnt offerings.

\w The|strong="H5046"\w* sacrifices \w of|strong="H6310"\w* God \w are|strong="H8193"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* broken spirit; \w a|strong="H3068"\w* broken \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* contrite \w heart|strong="H8193"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w You|strong="H5046"\w* \w will|strong="H6310"\w* \w not|strong="H6605"\w* despise.

\w In|strong="H2654"\w* \w Your|strong="H5414"\w* good \w pleasure|strong="H7521"\w*, \w cause|strong="H5414"\w* Zion \w to|strong="H5414"\w* prosper; build \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* walls \w of|strong="H2077"\w* Jerusalem.

\w Then|strong="H3808"\w* \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* delight \w in|strong="H7665"\w* righteous \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w*, \w in|strong="H7665"\w* whole \w burnt|strong="H3820"\w* \w offerings|strong="H2077"\w*; \w then|strong="H3808"\w* bulls \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* offered \w on|strong="H3808"\w* \w Your|strong="H3808"\w* altar.
